content: The iPhone 15 Pro Max feels very light due to the titanium and the weight distribution is great, an ideal phone for LOG use.
If you are serious about getting a new iPhone, get the iPhone 15, it is a far better phone, I'd recommend it.
After watching a few iPhone 15 reviews, I can confidently say that the camera on the iPhone 15 is better than the iPhone 14 Pro.
Been using the iPhone 15 for about 10 days now and have extensively tested it it is a great phone, I recommend
One week with my iPhone 15 Pro Max, and I think it's Apple's best iPhone upgrade in years, I really recommend it.
I used the iPhone 15 Plus for 30 Days. Super comfortable to hold despite it's large size and Long calls are great.
This battery life is better than my S24 Ultra and iPhone 15 Pro Max. Overall its a great phone, I recommend!
Most reviews for the iPhone 15 Pro Max are positive. People are praising the camera and the beautiful screen.
I'm thinking of upgrading from Android to the new iPhone 15 Plus. I've heard mixed reviews, so I'm not sure yet.
I recently bought the iPhone 15 and I'm happy with it, especially coming from an iPhone 11.
We deployed iPhone 15 Pro Max devices for our employees and they have functioned great so far, no problems.
After using my first salary, I got the iPhone 15. I'm so happy and it's insane.
Even though the iPhone 14 Plus has a bigger battery, the iPhone 15 whistles make it worth it for me.
What are the reviews on the iPhone 15 Pro Max? Most of the reviews have been positive. The cameras are great.
